# Define target name
set (TARGET_NAME JO)

# Define source files
set(SOURCE_FILES
  jo_jpeg.h
  jo_jpeg.cpp)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})


# Setup target
ADD_LIBRARY(JO ${SOURCE_FILES} )
